column4: hello i'm using 11.10, can someone tell me how is possible to disable guest login? adding "allow-guest=false" to lightdm.conf makes no sense
why does it make no sense?
I do but I just tell evince to run when I download a PDF
if you hold shift and select recovery mode, does it hang there, or can you select root?
all I can suggest personally is use liveCD and chroot, others may have a suggestion but not being able to get root recovery mode isn't a good sign
took me, what, 30 seconds to find....
